rows.label: bf03330100_0010
rows.name:
And I saw at that time that the powers of
darkness had engulfed almost everything!

rows.label: bf03330100_0020
rows.name:
People and Divine Beasts alike were
drawn into the abyssal vortex!

rows.label: bf03330100_0030
rows.name:
The apocalypse was upon
us! The end was nigh!

rows.label: bf03330100_0040
rows.name:
But then! Despite the wounds all over
his body, the great Adel stood...

rows.label: bf03330100_0060
rows.name:
Power to banish the dark! Power
to illuminate the world!

rows.label: bf03330100_0070
rows.name:
Lo! Loyal servant of the
God! The Holy Grail!

rows.label: bf03330100_0080
rows.name:
O Holy Grail! Bless me with your
power! Bring light upon the world!

rows.label: bf03330100_0110
rows.name:
Three great continents sank beneath
the sea of clouds forever.

rows.label: bf03330100_0120
rows.name:
Servant of God! By thy
power, the world is saved!

rows.label: bf03330100_0130
rows.name:
For the gift you have granted
us, we are eternally grateful.

rows.label: bf03330100_0140
rows.name:
I shall spread thy legend far and wide!
May your name live on for eternity!
